name: Cornowlius' Path
description:
If you are having performance issues with the WebGL build, please try the downloadable version below!

Find yourself stuck within two worlds, escaping from the depth of a steampunk world. Run, Jump and Wall run through the whole level and get to the finish line to win. Die and Retry until you manage to do a perfect run, or try to go as far as possible.

Cornowlius’ path is a game in which you will incarnate Cornowlius, the owlman, whose goal is to escape and free himself from the depth of a steampunk world by running and jumping through two Opposite worlds: the Fading Trial and the Boundless Haven, but only  in a perfect run. 
In order to switch from a world to another, Cornowlius needs to go through portals. However, The pace of the game scales with your progression in the game : The more you progress through the portals, the faster it gets.
You need to keep your reflexes on point: If you fail, you will have to start all over again.

Features

- Enjoy a very versatile movement: Jump, Double Jump and Wallrun!
- Die and Retry until you manage to do the perfect run 
- Be precise with every movement 
- Enjoy what two beautiful worlds have to offer 
- Inevitably cross the portals and readjust to the new reality

Fading Trial

In this world, you have to jump between platforms. You can also double jump when you are mid-air to reach further platforms.

Boundless Havens

Jump between walls without hitting the obstacles : Once to release and again to reach the other side.

Control: 

Press space to jump and to change sides.
